name: axion
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of elementary particle (= one of the simplest forms of all matter) that is believed to exist and be a part of dark matter (= a substance in space that does not give off any light): Little is known about axions, which is why they are believed to make up the mysterious substance known as dark matter. Researchers at many different laboratories are experimenting with efforts to detect the axion, but so far there has been no success.
More examplesFewer examplesAxions are thought to be extremely lightweight particles that are produced by the sun and then projected into space.
